content_elements.content: Instructions: Answer all questions. Some questions may have multiple correct answers.
Q1. (Multi-select) Which of the following are programming languages?
Q2. The capital of France is:
Q3. (True/False) The Sun is a star.
Q5. Match the countries with their capitals:
Q6. (Multi-select) Which of these are planets in our Solar System?
Q7. The largest ocean on Earth is:
Instructions: Answer all questions. Some questions may have multiple correct answers.
Q8. (True/False) Humans have walked on Mars.
Q9. Match the inventions with their inventors:
Q10. (Multi-select) Which of the following are mammals?
